communication.message: The European Patent Office herewith transmits relating to the above-identified European patent application: copies of the documents cited in the search report are enclosed.

search_division_approval.title: Figure
search_division_approval.abstract_modification: The abstract was modified by the Search Division and the definitive text is attached to the present communication.

communication.refund: REFUND-OF THE SEARCH FEE will be sent to you later.
